https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fy8iufEgmxWPZfSVgGcofW3XIVE.jpg One morning it is over. For Hampus it is a relief to break up from their destructive relationship, while Adrian is devastated. Will he be able to survive without the love of his life, or is there a way of somehow getting him back? Are We Lost Forever
